Title: Authorizes a study on proposed improvements of state route 303 in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland
Summary: Authorizes and directs the department of transportation to conduct a study on proposed improvements of state route 303 in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland.
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize a study on proposed improvements of state route 303 in the town of Orangetown, county of Rockland; and providing for the repeal of such provisions upon expiration thereof
